headline: A Fresh Look at Generac (GNRC) Valuation Following Standout Quarterly Revenue Growth
summary: Generac Holdings (GNRC) turned heads with its latest quarterly report, posting year-on-year revenue growth that beat Wall Street’s estimates. Both residential and commercial sales contributed to this stronger than expected result, drawing fresh interest from investors. See our latest analysis for Generac Holdings. Generac’s recent quarterly beat has reignited optimism, with its share price climbing over 12% in the past three months as investor sentiment improves. Still, the 1-year total...

headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid GNRC and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: What a time it’s been for Generac. In the past six months alone, the company’s stock price has increased by a massive 49.2%, reaching $171.06 per share. This was partly due to its solid quarterly results, and the performance may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.

headline: Renewable Energy Q2 Earnings: Generac (NYSE:GNRC) Simply the Best
summary: Wrapping up Q2 earnings, we look at the numbers and key takeaways for the renewable energy stocks, including Generac (NYSE:GNRC) and its peers.
